[Groovy] Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
class Person

This class represents a person in the system all people, no matter their role in the system, get a record in this table. All people in this database are treated as "first class citizens" this means that a person who is a subject can have all the same addressing, contact, and relationship features of someone in the system that is only there as an emergency contact.

Property Summary
java.lang.Boolean alive

This flags whether or not a person is alive.

java.lang.String appCreated

This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.

The birth date of the person if known.

java.lang.Boolean birthDateDayKnown

If the day of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.

If the month of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.
java.lang.Boolean birthDateYearKnown

If the year of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.

Method Summary
java.lang.Object beforeUpdate()

This is the before update trigger for this class, and it will make sure that the 'alive' and 'name' name fields are updated appropriately when the domain class instance changes.
java.lang.Integer getAge()

This calculates the age of this person based on today's date and thier birthDate field.
PersonAddress getBestAddress()

getBestAddress() returns the "best" address for this particular date and time.

java.lang.String getFullName()

getFullName returns a single string containing the concatenation of the title, firstName, middleName, lastName and suffix; using what ever of those are available to create as complete of a name as possible.
StreetAddress getPrimaryAddress()

getPrimaryAddress() returns the primary street address for this individual, if available.

PersonEmail getPrimaryEmail()

getPrimaryEmail() returns the primary email address for this individual, if available.

PersonPhone getPrimaryPhone()

getPrimaryPhone() returns the primary phone numberfor this individual, if available.

Property Detail

alive

java.lang.Boolean alive
This flags whether or not a person is alive. If the deathDate variable is cleared, then this should be set to true.

appCreated

java.lang.String appCreated
This field should be assigned the name of the application that is creating an instance of this class.

birthDate

java.util.Date birthDate
The birth date of the person if known. If only a portion of the date is unknown, be sure to update the birthDate*Known fields appropriately.

birthDateDayKnown

java.lang.Boolean birthDateDayKnown
If the day of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.

birthDateMonthKnown

java.lang.Boolean birthDateMonthKnown
If the month of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.

birthDateYearKnown

java.lang.Boolean birthDateYearKnown
If the year of the birthDate is unknown, please set this to false.

java.util.Date dateCreated
This field is automatically assigned the date that this particular ContactRole instance was created

java.util.Date deathDate
The date of death of the person if known. If only a portion of the date is unknown, be sure to update the deathDate*Known fields appropriately.

deathDateDayKnown

java.lang.Boolean deathDateDayKnown
If the day of the deathDate is unknown, please set this to false.

deathDateYearKnown

java.lang.Boolean deathDateYearKnown
If the year of the deathDate is unknown, please set this to false.

firstName

java.lang.String firstName
This is the first name of the person. This field can hold up to 30 characters.

gender

Gender gender
The gender, or sex of the person. If unknown, set to null

hasMany

static java.lang.Object hasMany
This contains all of the foreign key references for this class. The following attributes are collections of their respective object/
households
a collection of edu.umn.ncs.Household objects to whom this person is a member of.
ethnicities
these are all the ethnicities associated with this person
alternateLastNames
this is a collection of any alternate last names that is associated with this person. It is often used for things like maiden names.
streetAddresses
this is a collection of all the PersonAddress objects that are used to assign an address to a person.
phoneNumbers
this is a collection of all the PersonPhone objects that tie a person to a phone number.
emailAddresses
this is a collection of all the PersonEmail objects that tie a person to a phone number.
comments
this is a collection of all the PersonComment objects that are used to store comments about this person.

isRecruitable

java.lang.Boolean isRecruitable
Use this flag to see if this participant is eligible for recruitment into a study. Set this to true only if the person might be a study subject.

lastName

java.lang.String lastName
This is the last name of the person. This field can hold up to 30 characters.

lastUpdated

java.util.Date lastUpdated
This field should be propogated with the current date and time "new Date()" that an instance of this class is updated. Grails will automatically take care of this per section 5.5.1 of the Grails 1.3.7 documentation.

mapping

static java.lang.Object mapping

middleName

java.lang.String middleName
This field is the person's middle name. The maximum length for this field is 20 characters.

name

java.lang.String name
This is set to "fullName()" every time that the person record is updated.

ssn

java.lang.String ssn
This is the SSN of the person, if needed.

suffix

java.lang.String suffix
This is the person's proper title. This field can hold up to 10 characters. Examples of titles are Sr, III, etc...

title

java.lang.String title
This is the person's proper title. This field can hold up to 10 characters. Examples of titles are Mr, Ms, Dr, Rev, etc...

Constructor Detail

Person

Person()

 
Method Detail

beforeUpdate

java.lang.Object beforeUpdate()
This is the before update trigger for this class, and it will make sure that the 'alive' and 'name' name fields are updated appropriately when the domain class instance changes.

getAge

java.lang.Integer getAge()
This calculates the age of this person based on today's date and thier birthDate field.

getBestAddress

PersonAddress getBestAddress()
getBestAddress() returns the "best" address for this particular date and time. If the person has a seasonal address, then it puts preference over the address with the smallest time interval that is valid for today. This is helpful for "snowbirds" and people with cabins.

getFullName

java.lang.String getFullName()
getFullName returns a single string containing the concatenation of the title, firstName, middleName, lastName and suffix; using what ever of those are available to create as complete of a name as possible.

getPrimaryAddress

StreetAddress getPrimaryAddress()
getPrimaryAddress() returns the primary street address for this individual, if available. It uses the preferredOrder attribute of the PersonAddress class to find the #1 address.

getPrimaryEmail

PersonEmail getPrimaryEmail()
getPrimaryEmail() returns the primary email address for this individual, if available. It uses the preferredOrder attribute of the PersonAddress class to find the #1 address.

getPrimaryPhone

PersonPhone getPrimaryPhone()
getPrimaryPhone() returns the primary phone numberfor this individual, if available. It uses the preferredOrder attribute of the PersonPhone class to find the #1 address.

toString

java.lang.String toString()
The defailt string converter for this class. This returns "Person ID: ${id}, ${fullName}"
